sentences.en: Deposits which were formerly considered worthless can now be extracted.
sentences.cn: 过去认为不值得开采的矿藏现在能够开采了.

sentences.en: Formerly [ In the past ] the place was a heap of ruins.
sentences.cn: 当初 这里是一片废墟.

sentences.en: Formerly he often lingered about [ around ] a park, doing nothing.
sentences.cn: 从前他时常在公园里 逛荡, 无所事事.

sentences.en: Formerly he often lingered around a park doing nothing.
sentences.cn: 从前他一直在公园闲荡,无所事事.

sentences.en: Formerly he worked on a farm, but now he's a teacher.
sentences.cn: 以前他在农场工作, 但现在当教师.

sentences.en: Formerly most of our household utensils were made of brass.
sentences.cn: 以前我们家庭用的器皿多数是用黄铜做的.

sentences.en: Formerly the coal was dug with picks and spades.
Formerly, he talks big but now he sings small.
sentences.cn: 他过去满嘴大话,现在可说话小心了.

sentences.en: Formerly, the relations between a teacher and his pupils were dominated by fear on the part of the pupils.
sentences.cn: 以往的师生关系主要是学生惧怕老师。

sentences.en: He had formerly been in the Navy.
I know him well because he was formerly my fellow worker.
sentences.cn: 我所以对他熟悉,是因为我和他一起工作过.

sentences.en: Kiribati, formerly known as the Gilbert Islands
sentences.cn: 基里巴斯，旧称吉尔伯特群岛

sentences.en: The formerly [ once ] barren land has been changed into stretches of fertile fields.
sentences.cn: 昔日的荒地今天成了良田.

sentences.en: This boat was formerly used on the rivers of China.
sentences.cn: 这船从前航行在中国内河里.

sentences.en: This elegant hotel was formerly a castle.
sentences.cn: 这家雅致的酒店以前是座城堡。

sentences.en: This formerly inaccessible place can now be reached by road and rail.
sentences.cn: 这里过去是穷乡僻壤,现在铁路公路都畅通了.

sentences.en: We now enjoy these comforts of which formerly we had only heard.
sentences.cn: 我们现在享受到了过去只是听说过的那些舒适条件.

words.tran_cn: 模型，样板；起形成作用的人

trans.tran_cn: 原来，原先，以前，从前，刚才，先头
